about: Undergraduate ECE student at the National Technical University of Athens. Focus on algorithms, complexity, and quantum computing. Experienced in C++ and MATLAB with strong mathematics and programming background. Active member of the IEEE NTUA Student Branch Computer Society. Aspiring to pursue an academic research career in quantum algorithms and computational complexity.

items.title: National Technical University of Athens
items.subtitle: B.Sc. in Electrical and Computer Engineering
items.description: Focus on algorithms, complexity theory, and quantum computing.

items.title: Randomized Decision Tree Complexity
items.subtitle: Supervised by Prof. Nikos Leonardos
items.description: Research on lower bounds for randomized decision tree complexity of T-majority decision trees.

items.title: IEEE NTUA Student Branch
items.subtitle: Computer Society Member
items.description: Active member contributing to technical events and workshops.
